begin: ^Excuse me sir... why you look so sad...

c-0: ^Who are you?! Get away from my child, don’t you dare get close or touch her!
^Shocked “I-I’m sorry…” (Turns away and walks off slowly.)
^Whispering to the child “Anne, don’t just go up to strangers, okay? Not everyone in this world is good.
c-1: ^Smiling slightly "Where are your parents, kid? Want me to help you find them?” (Carlos touch her)
^Who are you?! I’m calling the police for touching my child!!
